summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 10.4°C), outside temperature (down 10.1°C), and inside temperature (down 1.7°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 13%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 400 m) and light levels (up 8618 lux).

The past week and month had observable variation in the amount of wind (up 21 miles), light levels (up 12960 lux), and cloud levels (up 284 m) when compared to today.

The cloud levels measurements for yesterday ranged from 425m to 1526m and averaged 553.5m, while the past week and month indicated warmer conditions.

summary.summary: Inside; a mild and comfortable temperature is anticipated. Outside; mild temperatures are expected. Also, dry and less humid conditions and gentle light winds are expected. Chance of light rain, cloud cover will be low, possibly causing overcast or foggy conditions, and periods of sunshine are expected. No significant shifts in the weather are expected.
